activities: CNH Industrial N.V. and its U.S. subsidiaries receive personal Human Resources data from EU countries regarding employees and their families or potential employees to be used strictly for internal employment and benefit related decisions, services and administration.
contactoff1: CNH America LLC, 6900 Veterans Boulevard, Burr Rid
contacttitle1: Senior VP, General Counsel and Secretary
corpofftitle1: Senior VP, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: CNH Industrial N.V. and its U.S. subsidiaries will comply with legal and regulatory authorities that provide for handling individual complaints and dispute resolution.  CNH Industrial N.V. and its U.S. subsidiaries will cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Swiss FDPIC) or their designated representatives.
